author: Alan Siegel
title: Go behind the scenes with Cam Newton and Buick | Ad Meter
text:
Go behind the scenes with Cam Newton and Buick Go behind the scenes with Cam Newton and Buick Go behind the scenes with Cam Newton and Buick share By Alan Siegel 4 hours ago 
NFL star Cam Newton and Buick have teamed up for a Super Bowl LI commercial. USA TODAY was on set with the Panthers quarterback during the filming of the ad.
